title: Mercedes-Benz India posts record half-yearly sales at 9,262 units
description: Mercedes-Benz reported a 9% growth in sales in India in the first half of 2024, reaching its highest ever half-yearly sales. The company's sales were 8,528 units in January-June 2023. The company plans to launch six new products in the second half of 2024. SUV penetration was 55% in H1 2024, with the top-end vehicle segment accounting for 25% of total sales.
